Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Zenziwa zaba semthethweni kunina izilwane zasolwandle nokudla kwazo, ukuze nisizakale kanye nalabo abayizihambi, futhi nanqatshelwa izilwane ezihlala emhlabeni uma nje nisasesimweni se-ihraam futhi sabani uMvelinqangi okunguyena eniyoqoqelwa kuyena

UMvelinqangi wenza iKa’aba indlu engcwele yokuma abantu (ukuze badumise uMvelinqangi) nenyanga engcwele neminikelo yezilwane kanye nezinemiqhele yezimbali lokhu kungukuthi ukuze nazi ukuthi uMvelinqangi uyakwazi konke okusemazulwini nakho konke okusemhlabeni nokuthi uMvelinqangi wazi ngazozonke izinto
Yazini ukuthi uMvelinqangi unzima ekujeziseni nokuthi uMvelinqangi uyathethelela unesihawu
Yazini ukuthi uMvelinqangi unzima ekujeziseni nokuthi uMvelinqangi uyathethelela unesihawu
Awukho (umthwalo) phezulu kwesithunywa ngaphandle kokudlulisa (umyalezo) futhi uMvelinqangi uyakwazi lokho enikuvezayo futhi nalokho enikufihlayo
Ithi akulingani okubi nobuhle futhi noma ngabe ububi bukujabulisa kakhulu ngakho-ke sabani uMvelinqangi Oh nina eniqondayo! Ukuze mhlawumbe niphumelele

Oh nina enikholwayo! Ningabuzi ngezinto okungathi uma zivezwa kunina zinikhathaze futhi uma nibuza ngazo ngesikhathi iQur’an yehliselwa phansi niyokhonjiswa zona, uMvelinqangi wakuthethelela lokho futhi uMvelinqangi uyathethelela uyabekezela
Abantu babuza (imibuzo enjalo) ngaphambilini kwenu ngenxa yayo (imibuzo) baphenduka abangakholwayo
